Vietnam Chapter of the Association for Information Systems (VAIS) has been established

Jul 20, 2021 • Duy Dang-Pham

I am glad to announce that the new Vietnam Chapter of the Association for Information Systems (VAIS), has been officially established. The goal of the VAIS is to foster collaboration in the research, teaching, and practice of information systems in Vietnam.

Read more about this news from RMIT Vietnam News: https://www.rmit.edu.vn/news/all-news/2021/july/new-collaboration-to-boost-research-in-information-systems

  • Duy Dang-Pham

Duy Dang-Pham (Đặng Phạm Thiên Duy) is an academic at RMIT University. His expertise focuses on information security management and digital transformation.
